description: Red ribbed compression racerback tank top

core:description.text: A vibrant red compression tank top with a distinctive ribbed texture and athletic racerback design. The high-performance synthetic fabric provides targeted compression support for enhanced muscle stability during intense workouts. The racerback cut allows for unrestricted shoulder movement while the moisture-wicking ribbed material keeps you cool and dry. The bold red color makes a confident statement in any gym or athletic setting.
